name: Automatic Bing Theme
description: Bing theme that automatically changes between dark and light mode based on browser / system theme. Also has an accent colour option.
additional_info:
Changelog:
2019/10/31
- Fixes for Microsoft Rewards Quizzes & Polls

2019/10/29
- Various fixes & improvements

2019/10/15
- Fixed News Section
- Fixed Lyrics display w/ video
- Started styling maps section
css:
@-moz-document domain("www.bing.com") {
/*[[theme]]*/
/*[[atheme]]*/
/*[[ltheme]]*/
/*[[dtheme]]*/


* {
    transition: background-color 0.2s ease, box-shadow 0.2s ease, border-color 0.2s ease;
}

/* Darkening the Scrollbar */
::-webkit-scrollbar {
    width: auto;
    border-left: 1px solid var(--object-background);
}

/* Track */
::-webkit-scrollbar-track {
    background-color: var(--background);
    border-left: 1px solid var(--object-background);
}

/* Handle */
::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb {
    background: var(--object-hover);
    border-left: 1px solid var(--object-background);
}
::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb:hover {
    background: var(--object-hover-hover);
}

/* Buttons */
::-webkit-scrollbar-button {
    background: var(--object-background);
    border-left: 1px solid var(--object-background);
}
::-webkit-scrollbar-button:hover {
    background: var(--object-hover);
}

#gradl,
.sfalg {
    background: linear-gradient(to right, var(--background, transparent));
}

#gradr,
.sfarg {
    background: linear-gradient(to left, var(--background, transparent));
}

.dg_b .dg_u,
.searchbox,
.searchButton,
.b_ans:not(.b_topborder) .tta_mop,
.tta_tbl td,
body .b_searchboxForm .b_searchboxSubmit,
.spl-singleNews,
#HBContent {
    border-radius: 6px;
}

.sw_plus::after {
    filter: grayscale(100%) brightness(5.0);
}

.tab-selected {
    border-bottom: 3px solid var(--accent);
}

.inline_tile .carousel .item .card {
    outline: none;
}

b_searchboxSubmit,
.nws_cm .vidr,
.nws_cm .twcwr .slide,
#detailPage.twoCol #detailInfo #actionbar {
    background-color: transparent !important;
}

[id$=_menu][id^=tabcontrol] .tab-active,
[id$=_menu][id^=tabcontrol] li:hover {
    box-shadow: inset 0 -3px 0 0 var(--border) !important;
}

.tab-menu li,
.tab-navl,
.tab-navr {
    fill: var(--border);
}

.news-side-nav {
    border-right: 1px solid var(--border);
}

.MicrosoftMap .taskLayoutContainer.Light,
.MicrosoftMap .taskLayoutContainer.Dark {
    backdrop-filter: blur(50px);
    background-color: var(--background-transparent);
}

#epvRup polyline,
#epvRdown polyline,
#epvLup polyline,
#epvLdown polyline {
    stroke: var(--shadow-border);
}

#epvRup polyline,
#epvRdown polyline,
#epvLup polyline,
#epvLdown polyline {
    fill: var(--object-background);
}

.actionmenu .actIconSvg svg,
.topactions a:hover .actIconSvg svg,
.topactions a:focus .actIconSvg svg,
.actionmenucontent .actionlist .actionitem a:hover .actIconSvg svg,
.actionmenucontent .actionlist .actionitem a:focus .actIconSvg svg {
    fill: var(--text);
}

.b_caption > p::before {
    padding: 0px 7px !important;
    border-color: #FF0000 !important;
    border-radius: 2px !important;
}

.spl-main .splc-tabs .splc-visref .tab-buttonMenu.tab-menu li.tab-active,
.splm-main .splc-tabs .splc-visref .tab-buttonMenu.tab-menu li.tab-active,
.spl-main .splc-tabs .splc-visref .tab-buttonMenu.tab-menu li {
    border-radius: 0;
}

h2.b_topTitle,
.plot_area {
    opacity: 1.0;
}

#tta_input_ta,
#tta_output_ta,
#tta_input_ta:active,
#tta_output_ta:active,
#tta_input_ta:focus,
#tta_output_ta:focus,
.t_option:focus {
    outline-color: transparent;
}

.plot_area {
    fill: transparent;
}

.plot_area {
    stroke: var(--border);
}

hr {
    color: var(--border);
}
}
